agency.hero_title: Based in Israel. A Global Stage.
agency.vision_text: Born in Jerusalem, at the crossroads of cultures and exacting standards, Seder Music is a booking and production agency conceived as a creative house. We don't just organize; we build artistic bridges between Israel and the rest of the world.
agency.leadership_bio: From musical direction to technical execution, we accompany the most demanding institutions and families in creating immersive experiences. Our international network allows us to break boundaries: inviting the exceptional to Israel, and bringing Israeli excellence to global stages.
agency.signature: Operational excellence in the service of radical emotion.

production.hero_subtitle: When Seder Music's vision meets the organization of Seder Events.
production.synergy_text: For every major production, Seder Music mobilizes the expertise of Seder Events. Our clients gain access to a universe of prestigious services, complex logistics, and international coordination.
production.uhnwi_text: Every gala, every concert is treated with the standards of the most demanding private concierge services.
production.signature: Seder Group: One signature, total mastery.

booking.hero_subtitle: World-renowned Singers, Musicians, and DJs for your stages.
booking.core_text: We provide access to major artists by guaranteeing complete management: from contract negotiation to technical logistics (travel, accommodation, riders). We understand the expectations of a global audience and connect the biggest stages with the rarest talents.
booking.wow_fact: The promise of pure emotion, from the first note to the final encore.

talents.title: R&D Records
talents.subtitle: From creative spark to global stage. We develop talents and produce musical excellence.

incubation.title: Talent Development
incubation.text: We scout and propel the new generation of Mediterranean and Oriental music. R&D Records provides global and bespoke support: from studio production to image coaching, music videos, and social media management. Our team puts its expertise at the service of your takeoff.
bullets: Booking on our events and concerts

production.title: Production & Pro Booking
production.text: The label also supports established artists and musicians. We put our production power and booking network at your disposal for your stage projects or recordings, whether you are a singer, composer, or instrumentalist.
bullets: Access to the Seder Music network

who.title: For Whom?
who.text: We are not just looking for voices, we are looking for signatures. Singers, solo musicians, composers: if you have raw talent, we have the structure to refine it.

influence.title: Influencer Marketing
influence.subtitle: Today, attention is earned with content, faces, and a credible story. Seder Music activates the power of artists, creators, and talents to give your brand strong visibility—and above all, real impact.

whatWeDo.title: What We Do
whatWeDo.text: We design and pilot bespoke influence campaigns around your product or service, transforming the image and audience of talents into high-performing content and activations.
bullets: Artists & Creators (music, lifestyle, entertainment, targeted niches)
Premium Content (Reels, TikTok, YouTube, Stories, Shorts)
Event Activations (showcases, launches, pop-ups, brand moments)

ourApproach.title: Our Approach
ourApproach.text: We don’t do “influence just for noise”. We build campaigns consistent with your image, with a clear strategy and mastered execution.

forWho.text: Brands, startups, institutions, events, hospitality, dining, lifestyle, luxury, tech, real estate, tourism… If you have a product to make known, we find the right voice to carry it.

cta.title: Work With Us
cta.text: Tell us about your brand, your goal, and your budget. We send you a clear proposal: concept + talents + calendar + deliverables.

manifesto.content: Seder is a creative house. We don't follow trends, we create them. Our approach is radical, our aesthetic is timeless. We are the architect of your vision.
